txt.en: You hear the gate to the south creak open
'Now you have angered me!'
'Agh! Take care of these fiends!'
There appears to be no obvious way to open this door.
'Wonderful! Now, to deal with this door...'
'FOOLS!!! You think you can defeat me so easily?!?'
'Wonderful! This is a riddle door... if you don't know how to open it, just ask!'
'You have merely defeated one of my pawns! Prepare to face your greatest challenge!'
'Ha! My necklace will shield me from your puny blows!'
'I'm not going through that again!'
'D'hear that? It's coming from the book-case...'
'Excellent work!'
'A runed plaque... perhaps it holds important information?'
'Bones everywhere... what happened here?'
The runes speak of a hidden door in the same room
'Hmm... this suspicious looking wall may be the secret door the text spoke of...'
The tremor has revealed a secret passage leading deeper into the caverns
Umín's necklace shield is temporarily disabled!
'Beware that pile of bones! It is not as inanimate as it appears...'
Umín calls out that he's started to pass through the trapped hallway.
The runes read: 'Here lies Yanwergh'
The runes read: 'Here lies Yunjalim'
'It appears to be some sort of maze...'
'It's really him...'
'Did you really think that you could come and take what is rightfully mine?!?'
'After so many years my search is finally complete...'
'This necklace was passed down through my family for generations until that... THIEF took it from us!'
'You go through first and I'll follow!'
'...but what is this?! It isn't here!!'
'After that terrible event, my ancestors' fortunes turned and what was once a great and noble people were reduced to beggars!'
'A dead end? ...or is it?'
'Impossible! He must have been buried with it...maybe under this...'
'All the years I spent searching ancient tomes and records for the rogue's whereabouts finally led me here...'
'Gah! Noooo!!'
'And then you show up! Did you think I would allow my family's treasure to be taken AGAIN?!?'
'I have to admit that you did prove to be useful, but I'm afraid I no longer require your assistance.'
'Now you shall join that rogue in his eternal slumber in this forsaken place!!'
'Ok, my turn... I'm coming!'
'What the-- a secret door? Don't expect me to follow you down there...'
Umín begins to follow you
Umín is attempting to heal himself! Find a way to knock him over!
'It's him! He's returned!'
'Look! It's some kind of trap mechanism...'
Umín's fist is stuck in the floorboards! Strike him from beneath!
'Aaarrgh!!! Wha.. what happened?'
'Hold on! Don't step on those pressure plates!'
'Ah, well done! Whom shall I follow now?'
'Leave me be woman!'
'Let me drown in my sorrows...'
'Help!'
'Look! There's a page from a journal on that barrel...'
'Careful! Don't step on those holes in the ground...'
The runes read: 'Here lies Khedem'
'Lead on!'
The runes read: 'Here lies Tunon'
The runes read: 'Here lies Tawult'
The runes read: 'Here lies Rubej'
The runes read: 'Here lies Shutet'
'I'll wait here, but don't go far!'
The runes read: 'Here lies Shabej'
'Urk! Heal me, my necklace...'
The runes read: 'Here lies Tuman'
The runes read: 'Here lies Mujesir'
'Oh! You startled me!'
'This hallway is full of them... you go first and I'll follow!'
The runes read: 'Here lies Budghed'
As the final bone pile falls, the exit gate creaks open
The bone piles cease their torment as the exit gate slides open
'There! Now, whom shall I follow?'
You hear the gate to the west creak open
'An incantation stone... let me examine its runes...'
Umín stops following you
'It seems to be some kind of burial chamber...'
Umín channels the power of his necklace to create a damage shield!
'Another riddle door... let me know if you have trouble with it.'
The runes read: 'You have reached the end. Turn back now.'
